headline: Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing (VAPT)
padding1: VAPT is a security testing method to find weaknesses in IT systems. It combines automated tools and manual testing to assess security.
padding2: INTRODUCTION, Types of VAPT, Platforms of VAPT, Scope of VAPT.

headline: Network VAPT
padding1: Securing Networks: Infrastructure Assessment, Tools: Nmap, Nessus, Wireshark, Hydra. Threats: Compromising DCs, Pass the Hash, Eternal Blue.
padding2: Attacks: Rules AD & DC, Post Exploitation, AV Evasion. Exploits: FTP Server Compromising. Reporting: Actionable Insights.

headline: Practice lab
padding1: Practice Lab: Hands-on Environment for Practical Learning and Skill Development.
padding2: Need of Practice Lab, BWAPP, Multillidae, DVWA.

headline: Metasploit
padding1: Metasploit: Exploits, Scanners, Payloads, Web Attack. Comprehensive Pentesting Solution.

headline: VWeb VAPT
padding1: VAPT: Secure Websites, Tools: BurpSuite, Acunetix, etc. Threats: OWASP Top 10, LFI, RFI.
padding2: Attacks: Compromising Server, CSRF, etc. Reporting: Actionable Insights.

headline: Auditing
padding1: VAPT is a security testing method to find weaknesses in IT systems. It combines automated tools and manual testing to assess security.
padding2: INTRODUCTION, Types of VAPT, Platforms of VAPT, Scope of VAPT.

headline: Mobile App VAPT
padding1: Firewall, Network, System, and OS Auditing:
padding2: Comprehensive Assessments for Security and Compliance.

headline: OSINT
padding1: OSINT: Open-Source Intelligence Gathering for Comprehensive Insight, Cloud VAPT, OT CSADA, Binary Analysis & Exploitation: Comprehensive Security Assessments for Modern Threat Landscapes.

headline: DNS VAPT
padding1: DNS VAPT: Securing Domain Name Systems Through Rigorous Testing and Assessment.
padding2: DNS Records: SPF, Mapping, Enumeration, Tracing.

headline: Other Topics
padding1: IoT Hacking: Introduction, History, Scope, Tools: Censys, Shodan, Raspberry Pi. Fliper Zero Bug Hunting: Approach, Scope, Understanding Target, Common Mistakes, POC, CTF Challenges.
